title: 2021 Nine-month sales
description: Nestlé reports nine-month sales for 2021, raises full-year organic sales growth guidance

title: PepsiCo Announces Webcast of Annual Shareholders' Meeting
description: virtual annual shareholders' meeting  will be webcast live on Wednesday, May 5, 2021 at 9 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time. In light of ongoing concern regarding COVID-19, and to promote the health and well-being of our employees, shareholders, directors, officers and other stakeholders, the Annual Meeting will be a virtual-only meeting.

title: BASF and Cargill expand partnership to develop and market innovative enzyme-based solutions for the animal feed industry
description: BASF and Cargill are expanding their partnership in the animal nutrition business, adding research and development capabilities and new markets to the partners’ existing feed enzymes distribution agreements.

title: 2020 Virtual Investor Update
description: Watch as Chris Kempczinski (Chief Executive Officer), Kevin Ozan (Chief Financial Officer) and other members of McDonald’s senior management team share the evolution of the Company’s growth strategy and provide an update on strategic priorities.

title: Western Days Ronnie Sowle Memorial Bull Riding Event
description: Championship Bull Riding sanctioned by S.E.B.R.A. – Southeast Bull Riders Association.

title: America is Freezing Food at Record Rates
description: Americans have been freezing food at record rates these past two years, with a majority of people across the country (55%) saying they bought a second or even third freezer to house all the extra frozen food.

title: The Coca-Cola Company Acquires Remaining Stake in BODYARMOR
description: The Coca-Cola Company today announced that it has acquired full ownership of BODYARMOR, a line of sports performance and hydration beverages that is incremental to the Coca-Cola beverage portfolio and has significant potential for long-term growth.

title: FoodBytes! Chicago 2019
description: FoodBytes! by Rabobank is coming to the Heartland on Thursday September 19!  Join us in Chicago on Sept 19th to see 15 of the most promising global food & ag startups take the stage.

title: 10,000 Women, HereToBeHeard Mars Unveils Findings from Global Listening Study to Advance Gender Equity
description: Mars, Incorporated today released the findings of #HereToBeHeard, a global listening study created to amplify the voices of women across all intersections – including race, age, sexuality, religion, disability and more – in a meaningful dialogue on how to shape a more inclusive world. Launched at a time when the crushing and disproportionate impact of Covid-19 on women has set the march to equality back by 136 years1, the new report aims to advance action on gender equity.

title: Hershey Reports Third-Quarter 2021 Financial Results; Raises 2021 Net Sales and Earnings Outlook
description: Consumer demand for our brands has remained robust on both a one- and two-year basis, said Michele Buck, The Hershey Company President and Chief Executive Officer.  Our continued focus on operating with speed and agility has enabled us to respond quickly to changes in the marketplace and develop plans to maintain sales momentum, increase production and sustain our advantaged margin structure over the long term.
